com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.sort

Class Sort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.sort.Sort
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sort.DescriptorSort, Sort.SimpleSort, Sort.SpecialSort

    public abstract class Sort
extends java.lang.Object
    Sorting Abstract Class with static friendly user methods to create sorting query objects and to be implemented by basic sort objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Sort.DescriptorSort
      Sorting class which sorts results based on a field.
      static class  Sort.Direction 
      static class  Sort.SimpleSort
      Sorting class which sorts results based on a field.
      static class  Sort.SpecialSort
      Abstract class to be implemented by complex sorting objects.
